Verses: 1 karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Nammudaiya Dhevanaik Keerththanampannugiradhu Nalladhu, Thudhiththale Inbamum Etradhumaayirukkiradhu.
2 karththar Erusalemaik Kattugiraar; Thuraththunda Isravelaraik Koottichserkkiraar.
3 irudhayam Norungundavargalaik Gunamaakkugiraar, Avargaludaiya Kaayangalaik Kattugiraar.
4 avar Natchaththirangalin Lakkaththai Enni, Avaigalukkellaam Perittu Azhaikkiraar.
5 nammudaiya Aandavar Periyavarum Magaa Belamullavarumaayirukkiraar; Avarudaiya Arivu Alavillaadhadhu.
6 karththar Saandhagunamullavargalai Uyarththugiraar; Dhunmaarkkaraith Tharaimattum Thaazhththugiraar.
7 karththaraith Thudhiyudan Paadikkondaadungal; Nammudaiya Dhevanaich Suramandalaththaal Keerththanam Pannungal.
8 avar Vaanaththai Megangalaal Moodi, Boomikku Mazhaiyai Aayaththappaduththi, Malaigalil Pullai Mulaippikkiraar.
9 avar Mirugajeevangalukkum Kooppidugira Kaakkaik Kunjugalukkum Aagaarankodukkiraar.
10 avar Kudhiraiyin Balaththil Viruppamaayiraar; Veeranudaiya Kaalgalil Piriyappadaar.
11 thamakkup Bayandhu, Thamadhu Kirubaikkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalmel Karththar Piriyamaayirukkiraar.
12 erusaleme, Karththarai Sthoththiri; Seeyone, Un Dhevanaith Thudhi.
13 avar Un Vaasalgalin Thaazhppaalgalaip Balappaduththi, Unnidaththilulla Un Pillaigalai Aaseervadhikkiraar.
14 avar Un Ellaigalaich Samaadhaanamullavaigalaakki, Uchchidhamaana Godhumaiyinaal Unnaith Thirupdhiyaakkugiraar.
15 avar Thamadhu Vaarththaiyaip Boomiyile Anuppugiraar; Avarudaiya Sol Magaa Theeviramaaich Sellugiradhu.
16 panjaippol Uraindha Mazhaiyaith Tharugiraar; Saambalaippol Uraindha Paniyaith Thoovugiraar.
17 avar Thamadhu Kalmazhaiyaith Thunikkaigalaaga Anuppugiraar; Avarudaiya Kulirukku Munbaaga Nirpavan Yaar?
18 avar Thamadhu Vaarththaiyai Anuppi, Avaigalai Urugappannugiraar; Thamadhu Kaatrai Veesumpadi Seyya, Thanneergal Odum.
19 yaakkobukkuth Thammudaiya Vasanangalaiyum, Isravelukkuth Thamadhu Piramaanangalaiyum Thamadhu Niyaayangalaiyum Arivikkiraar.
20 avar Vere Endha Jaadhikkum Ippadich Seydhadhillai; Avarudaiya Niyaayangalai Ariyaamarpogiraargal. Allelooyaa.
